title: Unity SyncSketch
description: SyncSketch is a secure collaboration platform that accelerates work and review for media files including images, videos, 360-degree content, and 3D models.
longDescription:
Built by artists, for artists, SyncSketch is an intuitive real-time visual communication platform that seamlessly connects your teams, tools, and workflows, so your creatives can execute together faster – from anywhere. Teams can review projects offline or in real-time, with no compression artifacts or skipped frames. With SyncSketch it feels like you’re in the same room.


START SYNCSKETCH FOR FREE

The SyncSketch Light (free) tier includes up to five (5) seats, up to 1GB of data storage, and allows users to upload up to 2 GB per calendar month. This metric will reset to zero at the beginning of every calendar month. SyncSketch Light accounts will be able to work with a maximum of two (2) projects at a given time. After free tier resources are consumer, you can access additional seats or storage by either upgrading your plan or signing up for a 14-day free trial of our Indie or Team plans. To learn more about our Enterprise plan, contact us. 


WHY SYNCSKETCH

  • Fast feedback. Empower your artists with industry-leading drawing and annotation tools to capture precise feedback—more than just red lines and circles.
  • Instant collaboration. Iterate faster with the power to share a link and collaborate both asynchronously and in real-time, from anywhere. Unlimited participants—no compression artifacts, no skipped frames.
  • 3D asset review. Review static or animated 3D assets directly in SyncSketch, including shading, textures, and UV maps. 
  • Secure infrastructure. Collaborate freely without compromising valuable IP. Your work is protected with a SOC 2 compliant security setup.
  • Seamless integration. Connects with your existing tools like Maya and Unity, allowing easy access to everyone’s comments in one central place. Work efficiently and effortlessly.
  • Creative freedom. Iterate faster, with the power to share a link and collaborate both asynchronously and in real-time, from anywhere.


KEY FEATURES

  1. Powerful brush engine. Deliver precise, frame-accurate feedback to your media with our high-fidelity brush tools that enable your team to give clear and relevant notes.
  2. High-performance review. Easy link sharing enables unlimited users to review media online or offline, synchronously or asynchronously – no latency, compression artifacts, or skipped frames.
  3. 3D model viewer. View and critique any 3D model, environment, or asset in a complete 360-degree review session, all in one central platform.
  4. Any browser, any device. Laptop or desktop, mobile, or tablet – give and receive feedback from wherever you happen to be, on whatever device helps you communicate best.
  5. API and integrations. Supports software such as Unity, Maya, and ShotGrid out of the box, with a simple well-documented API for seamless integration with other apps in your pipeline. Tailor your workflow to your needs.
  6. Industry-vetted security. Follows an MPAA-approved framework and is SOC 2 compliant. With 256-bit encryption, our information security framework aligns with ISO 27001 standards.


GETTING STARTED

1. Click on the “Free” button in the marketplace page to navigate to SyncSketch’s pricing page.

2. Select the free Light plan, or click to start a free 14-day trial of SyncSketch’s Indie or Team plan.

3. Create a SyncSketch account if you do not already have one.

4. After the 14-day trial has ended, you will automatically enroll in the subscription of your choosing. You can cancel at anytime.


Where can I get a demo of SyncSketch? 

Check out our video product demo for a quick look at how to get started with SyncSketch and an overview of our top features.


GET HELP


For support

Email us: support@syncsketch.com

Open a support ticket: https://support.syncsketch.com/ or click on the ? support icon directly in the bottom right corner of the SyncSketch app.


For plans and pricing 

Review SyncSketch plans and pricing. To learn more about our Enterprise plan, contact us. 


SyncSketch is owned and operated by Unity Technologies SF. The Epic Marketplace Terms of Service do not apply to your use of SyncSketch. All use of SyncSketch is subject to the SyncSketch Terms of Service.
technicalDetails:
FEATURES

  • Web-based collaboration: A fully web-centric collaboration solution requiring no additional installations or dedicated apps.
  • Global accessibility: As a cloud-native platform, SyncSketch is accessible from anywhere and on any device.
  • Optimized media sharing: SyncSketch’s compression and streaming technologies ensures rapid sharing of media files worldwide, even on constrained bandwidths.


Integrations:

  • Integrations with content creation tools including Maya, ShotGrid, and Unity
  • Ability to integrate into your pipeline via API and webhooks


File formats: SyncSketch supports all of the most common video container formats and compression schemes used by content creation professionals, including but not limited to the following compatible file formats: 

  • video formats including mp4, mov, webm, mkv
  • 3D models including OBJ, FBX, GLV
  • images including BMP, EXR, GIF, JPG, PDF, PNG, PSD, TGA, TIFF, WebP
  • PDF


Security:

  • Multi-Factor Authentication available for all users
  • Role-based permissions for all workspaces
  • Enterprise workspaces can configure SSO login and bring their own S3 storage for media
